location: Renai Road Section 2, near Dongmen MRT Station (470m), Zhongzheng/Zhongshan District
notes: Full-floor 2BR/2LR/1BA unit on floors 6-7 of an elevator building, suggesting a duplex layout with internal stairs - a significant baby safety concern requiring gates. Includes balcony (railing safety should be verified in person). Near Dongmen MRT and well-served by transit. Cats permitted, natural gas included, furnished with major appliances. The duplex staircase is the primary baby hazard. Modernity is unclear from description alone - the listing mentions 'low-key aesthetic' but no renovation details. At NT$45,000 for ~20 ping in this prime location, condition should be verified in person.
